description:
The ultimate sports entertainment platform. 

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, bet, buy and socialise all in one place. 

Watch Anytime, Anywhere 
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are. 

Play in FanZone and beyond 
Dive into the action with FanZone. Chat live, send reactions, and connect with fellow fans in real-time. It’s your front-row seat to the heart of the game. 

Bet Live, Stay Thrilled 
Place your bets while you watch. With live betting integrated into your viewing experience, every moment is more exciting. DAZN keeps you on the edge of your seat. 

Connect with Fans 
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event. 
 
DAZN brings you the ultimate sports streaming experience with a world of content available anytime, anywhere:  

• Dive into the "Home of Boxing" for top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content.  
• Stay up-to-date with the "Schedule" feature, setting alerts for your favourite games.  
• Navigate effortlessly with the new sub navigation bar to quickly access your favourite competitions.  
• Get real-time "Stats and Scores" for all games, even those not streaming on DAZN.  
• Explore full "Fight Cards" for boxing events and revisit past rounds with a single click.  
• The enhanced search page ensures you find what you’re looking for swiftly. 
• Engage with other fans in the "FanZone" by cheering, chatting, sending reactions, and participating in polls.  
• Manage your account with ease using the new profile section.  
• Browse and watch a variety of live channels with the EPG for live channels feature.  

DAZN holds the world's largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights; 
• History-making fights including Anthony Joshua, Ryan Garcia and more from Matchroom Promotions, and Golden Boy Promotions. 
• NFL Game Pass, with access to every game. 
• The best of live Women’s Football including UEFA Women’s Champions League, Liga F, NWSL and Frauen-Bundesliga. 
• All the action from Professional Fighters League (PFL), DAZN & MF: X Series featuring KSI, Basketball from the NBL and a massive portfolio of MMA events from Naciones MMA, Ansgar Fighting League, and more. 
• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content to keep you entertained. This includes Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, Padel TIME TV and more. 
• If you love video-on-demand (VOD) content we have you covered with our extensive list of sports documentaries, features and shows. 

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before. 

Terms of Use https://www.dazn.com/en-US/help/articles/pp-tcs-all  
Privacy Policy: https://www.dazn.com/en-US/help/articles/pp-tcs-all  

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase & your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
releaseNotes: At DAZN, we are always working on improving our service, with the aim of giving our fans the best possible sports-streaming experience. This update includes bug fixes and general improvements to the DAZN app.
